author: abhih1
body:
#### PR description:

The code to update the offline DB tags EcalDQMTowerStatus_v1_hlt and EcalDQMChannelStatus_v1_hlt, was outdated and non functional. This PR fixes the issue. These are the tags from which the DQM GUI reads the list of known problematic towers in ECAL and displays them as dark red/dark yellow vs red/yellow.

#### PR validation:
PR is validated by running a local test which successfully creates an sqlite file which is uploaded to the DB and verified with an online DQM run on a test DQM GUI. Everything looks as expected.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38357
Backport needed to maintain continuity in production versions
title: Code Fix to read tower geometry correctly in Ecal DQM StatusManager  [12_3_X]
